item.name: stone
item.other: Can be obtained by smelting Cobblestone in a Furnace.

item.name: grass block
item.other: Grass spreads to nearby Dirt blocks (with light level of 4 or more) when above light level 9 and not covered.

item.name: dirt
item.other: Acquired by harvesting Grass or Dirt.

item.name: cobblestone
item.other: Acquired by harvesting Stone or Cobblestone.

item.name: planks
item.other: Can be used as fuel (15 seconds), color varies with color of wood: oak yields tan/ birch yields white/ pine yields brown/ jungle yields pink.

item.name: sapling
item.other: 1/20 (1/40 for jungle saplings) chance of falling from Leaf blocks when broken, plantable to regrow trees, can be used as fuel (5 seconds).

item.name: bedrock
item.other: Cannot be destroyed by TNT.

item.name: water
item.other: Un-diggable, can be picked up with empty Bucket/Bottle, stops explosions from affecting other blocks.

item.name: lava
item.other: Un-diggable, can be picked up with empty Bucket, can start Fire.

item.name: sand
item.other: Can be crafted into Sandstone or smelted into Glass.

item.name: gravel
item.other: 1/10 chance of dropping Flint when broken, normally drops a Gravel block.

item.name: gold ore
item.other: Always drops as a Gold ore block.

item.name: iron ore
item.other: Always drops as an Iron ore block.

item.name: coal ore
item.other: Drops Coal when dug.

item.name: wood
item.other: Can be used as fuel (15 seconds).

item.name: leaves
item.other: Decays when not near Wood, unless player-placed.

item.name: sponge
item.other: A creative-only decorative block, with no special properties.

item.name: glass
item.other: A transparent block.

item.name: lapis lazuli ore
item.alt: lapiz lazuli ore, lapiz, lapiz ore
item.other: Drops Lapis Lazuli when dug.

item.name: lapis lazuli block
item.other: Can be crafted to save space (un-crafting yields 9 Lapis Lazuli).

item.name: dispenser
item.other: Interacts with Redstone, will fire things out front.

item.name: sandstone
item.other: A decorative block.

item.name: chiseled sandstone
item.other: A decorative block.

item.name: smooth sandstone
item.other: A decorative block.

item.name: note block
item.other: Interacts with Redstone, right-clicking changes pitch, makes different sounds based on the block underneath, can be used as fuel (15 seconds).

item.name: bed bottom
item.other: Sets the time to day, and sets your spawn point when used at night.

item.name: powered rail
item.other: Interacts with Redstone, makes Minecarts move.

item.name: detector rail
item.key: I=iron ingot | R=redstone dust | P=stone pressure plate
item.other: Triggers Redstone when a Minecart goes over it, Comparators powered by Detector rails give out a signal based on fullness of the container on the rail.

item.name: sticky piston
item.other: Interacts with Redstone, pushes and pulls blocks.

item.name: spider web
item.other: Drops String when dug, makes players/mobs (besides spider) move slowly.

item.name: grass
item.alt: tall grass, long grass, fern, living shrub
item.location: On Grass blocks in certain biomes
item.other: Occasionally drops Wheat Seeds.

item.name: dead bush
item.location: In deserts and rarely in swamps
item.other: N/A

item.name: piston
item.key: C=cobblestone | I=iron ingot | P=planks | R=redstone dust
item.other: Interacts with Redstone, pushes blocks.

item.name: piston top
item.other: Unobtainable.

item.name: wool
item.other: Dropped when Sheep killed/sheared.

item.name: block 36
item.other: Unobtainable.

item.name: dandelion
item.location: In random clusters on Grass blocks
item.other: A lovely yellow flower, common to grassy biomes.

item.name: rose
item.location: In small random clusters on Grass blocks
item.other: Somewhat rarer than Dandelions, Roses are typically found alone, or in groups of 3-4.

item.name: brown mushroom
item.location: Swamps, Mushroom Biomes, and the Nether
item.other: Not placeable in bright places/ next to adjacent blocks.

item.name: red mushroom
item.location: Swamps, Mushroom Biomes, and the Nether
item.other: Not placeable in bright places/ next to adjacent blocks.

item.name: block of gold
item.other: Can be crafted to save space (uncrafting yields 9 Gold ingots).

item.name: block of iron
item.other: Can be crafted to save space (uncrafting yields 9 Iron ingots).

item.name: double stone slab
item.alt: two stone slabs, stacked stone slabs
item.other: Made in world by placing a Stone slab on top of another.

item.name: single stone slab
item.other: Mobs cannot spawn on single Stone slabs unless they are upside-down.

item.name: bricks
item.other: A decorative block.

item.name: tnt
item.other: Interacts with Redstone, explodes when lit by Redstone or Fire.

item.name: bookshelf
item.other: Drops 3 Books when dug, will make Enchantment tables more powerful when placed 1 meter away.

item.name: moss stone
item.alt: mossy cobblestone, mossy cobble, mossy, moss
item.other: A decorative block, which can be made into Mossy Cobblestone walls.

item.name: obsidian
item.location: Near lava and water in same location
item.other: Cannot be destroyed by TNT, used to make Nether portals, Ender chests, Enchantment tables, and Beacons.

item.name: torch
item.other: Generates light, breaks falling Sand, Gravel, and Dragon eggs.

item.name: fire
item.location: Located on lightning strikes, the Nether
item.other: Destroys certain blocks, punch to put out, unobtainable.

item.name: monster spawner
item.other: Creates mobs when player is near.

item.name: oak wood stairs
item.other: Allows player/mobs to move up blocks without jumping, can be placed upside-down, can be used as fuel (15 seconds).

item.name: chest
item.other: Holds items, can be placed next to others to enlarge, must have open space above to work, can be used as fuel (15 seconds).

item.name: redstone wire
item.other: Unobtainable, drops Redstone dust when dropped, can be powered to transfer Redstone current.

item.name: diamond ore
item.other: Drops Diamond when dropped.

item.name: block of diamond
item.other: Used for saving space (un-crafting yields 9 Diamonds).

item.name: crafting table
item.other: Used to craft other items, can be used as fuel (15 seconds).

item.name: wheat stalks
item.other: Drops seeds and wheat when dug, created by using Seeds on Farmland.

item.name: farmland
item.other: Drops Dirt when dug, turns to Dirt when jumped on, can be hydrated by nearby water.

item.name: furnace
item.other: Smelts items, cooks food, and emits light when in use.

item.name: sign post
item.other: Not obtainable.

item.name: wooden door bottom
item.other: Not regularly obtainable.

item.name: ladder
item.other: Allows player to climb walls.

item.name: rail
item.other: Minecarts ride on Rails.

item.name: cobblestone stairs
item.other: Allows player/mobs to move up blocks without jumping, can be placed upside-down.

item.name: wall sign
item.other: Drops Sign when dug, only placeable on vertical surfaces.

item.name: lever
item.other: Interacts with Redstone, generates current when toggled on.

item.name: stone pressure plate
item.other: Interacts with Redstone, generates Redstone current when stood on by players or mobs.

item.name: iron door bottom
item.other: Not regularly obtainable.

item.name: wooden pressure plate
item.other: Interacts with Redstone, generates Redstone current when pressed (mobs/items/projectiles), can be used as fuel (15 seconds).

item.name: redstone ore
item.other: Lights up and emits particles when dug/walked on, drops Redstone when dug.

item.name: redstone torch
item.other: Interacts with Redstone, generates Redstone current, toggles depending on input as well, emits small amount of light.

item.name: stone button
item.other: Interacts with Redstone, generates current when pressed by player.

item.name: snow
item.other: Drops 1 Snowball per layer when dug by a Shovel, melts when near light sources.

item.name: ice
item.location: In Ice Plains and Taiga biomes
item.other: Creates Water when melted, slippery, accelerates movement of entities, players, and mobs.

item.name: snow block
item.other: Can be used to store Snowballs (uncrafting yields 4 Snowballs).

item.name: cactus
item.other: Grows 3 meters tall, damages mobs, must be placed on Sand, cannot have blocks adjacent to it.

item.name: clay block
item.location: Usually under water, but anywhere near sand
item.other: Digging yields 3-5 Clay balls.

item.name: sugar cane
item.other: Must be placed on Grass, grows 3 meters tall.

item.name: jukebox
item.other: Plays Music disks, can be used as fuel (15 seconds).

item.name: fence
item.other: Effectively 1.5 meters tall to mobs, can be used as fuel (15 seconds).

item.name: pumpkin
item.location: On grass, common in mountains and plains
item.other: Can be used to make Golems or Jack o Lanterns.

item.name: netherrack
item.alt: netherstone, netherrock, nether stone, nether rack, nether rock
item.other: Will burn forever if lit on fire.

item.name: soul sand
item.other: Mobs/items moving on Soul Sand will have decreased speed.

item.name: glowstone
item.other: Drops 2-4 Glowstone dust when broken.

item.name: portal
item.other: Not normally obtainable, can transport players, mobs, and items to the Nether.

item.name: jack o lantern
item.other: Will glow underwater, emits light.

item.name: cake block
item.other: Eating Cake cuts off piece.

item.name: redstone repeater block
item.other: Cannot float, unobtainable, drops Redstone Repeater when dug.

item.name: locked chest
item.other: Placeholder block, decay when placed.

item.name: trapdoor
item.other: Allows/ denies mobs from going up/down holes in ground/roof, can be used as fuel (15 seconds).

item.name: silverfish block
item.other: Easily destroyed by hand, spawned using stone/ cobblestone eggs, drops silverfish when dug.

item.name: stone bricks
item.other: N/A

item.name: huge brown mushroom
item.other: Drops brown mushrooms when dug, can be used as fuel (15 seconds).

item.name: huge red mushroom
item.other: Drops red mushrooms when dug, can be used as fuel (15 seconds).

item.name: iron bars
item.other: Decorative block, Ghast-proof.

item.name: glass pane
item.other: Decorative block.

item.name: melon
item.other: Yields 3-7 Melon slices when dug.

item.name: pumpkin stem
item.other: Drops 0-3 Pumpkin seeds when dug.

item.name: melon stem
item.other: Drops 0-4 Melon seeds when dug.

item.name: vines
item.other: Must be placed on bottom/sides of block, will spread, climbable.

item.name: fence gate
item.other: Must be block beneath it when placed (block beneath can be dug later), effectively 1.5 meters tall to mobs.

item.name: brick stairs
item.other: Allows player/mobs to move up blocks without jumping, can be placed upside-down.

item.name: stone brick stairs
item.other: Allows player/mobs to move up blocks without jumping, can be placed upside-down.

item.name: mycelium
item.other: Drops Dirt when dug, emits spore particles.

item.name: lily pad
item.other: Can only be placed on Water.

item.name: nether brick
item.other: Decorative block.

item.name: nether brick fence
item.other: Effectively 1.5 meters tall to mobs.

item.name: nether brick stairs
item.other: Allows player/mobs to move up blocks without jumping, can be placed upside-down.

item.name: nether wart
item.alt: nether stalk, netherwart, netherwort, nether wort
item.other: Unobtainable, drops 2-4 Nether Wart seeds when fully grown.

item.name: enchantment table
item.other: Used to enchant tools and armor, 0.75 meters tall.

item.name: brewing stand
item.other: Drops Brewing stand when dug.

item.name: cauldron
item.other: Drops Cauldron when dug.

item.name: end portal
item.location: In Strongholds and in the End
item.other: Not normally obtainable, can transport players, mobs, and items to the End.

item.name: ender portal frame
item.other: Can hold Eyes of Ender, unbreakable.

item.name: end stone
item.other: Unbreakable by Enderdragon, highest blast resistance of any block destroyable by explosions.

item.name: dragon egg
item.location: On top of the portal out of the End
item.other: Hitting it teleports it a short distance away, must be picked up with the "Sand and Torch" technique.

item.name: redstone lamp
item.other: Interacts with Redstone, emits light when Redstone signal received.

item.name: active redstone lamp
item.alt: active lantern, on redstone lamp, on lantern
item.other: Unobtainable.

item.name: double wooden slab
item.alt: stacked wooden slabs, two wooden slabs,
item.other: Drops two slabs when dug, color varies with color of Wood.

item.name: single wooden slab
item.alt: wooden slab, wood slab, half wood block
item.other: Can be used as fuel (15 seconds), color varies with color of Wood.

item.name: cocoa pod
item.other: Grows on trees, unobtainable, drops Cocoa Beans when dug, located on side of Jungle Logs.

item.name: sandstone stairs
item.other: Allows player/mobs to move up blocks without jumping, can be placed upside-down.

item.name: emerald ore
item.other: Drops Emeralds when dug.

item.name: ender chest
item.other: Holds items, if chest destroyed then items will not fall out, drops 8 Obsidian when broken without Silk Touch, only one inventory in all Ender chests per player, must have open space above to work.

item.name: tripwire hook
item.other: Interacts with Redstone, generates signal if entity touches Tripwire (including mobs and projectiles like Arrows).

item.name: tripwire
item.other: Entity activates by touching it (this includes mobs and Projectiles), drops String when dug.

item.name: block of emerald
item.other: Uncrafting yields 9 Emeralds.

item.name: spruce wood stairs
item.other: Allows player/mobs to move up blocks without jumping, can be placed upside-down, can be used as fuel (15 seconds).

item.name: birch wood stairs
item.other: Allows player/mobs to move up blocks without jumping, can be placed upside-down, can be used as fuel (15 seconds).

item.name: jungle wood stairs
item.other: Allows player/mobs to move up blocks without jumping, can be placed upside-down, can be used as fuel (15 seconds).

item.name: command block
item.other: Used to run server commands for adventure maps and other uses.

item.name: beacon
item.other: Buffs players in range when stacked on a pyramid of Blocks of Diamond, Emerald, Gold, or Iron. 1 layer: 41 block diameter; 2 layers: 61 block diameter; 3 layers: 81 block diameter; 4 layers: 101 block diameter.

item.name: cobblestone wall
item.other: Works like a Fence, Moss stone can be used instead of Cobblestone, effectively 1.5 meters tall to mobs.

item.name: flower pot
item.other: Block item of Flower Pots.

item.name: carrot crop
item.other: Block item of growing Carrot plant.

item.name: potato crop
item.other: Block item of growing Potato plant.

item.name: wooden button
item.other: Can be activated by Arrows or by players pressing.

item.name: head
item.other: Block item of Heads.

item.name: anvil
item.other: Used for item repair interface.

item.name: trapped chest
item.other: Chest that emits a Redstone signal when opened.

item.name: light weighted pressure plate
item.alt: gold weighted pressure plate, gold pressure plate, light pressure plate
item.other: Pressure plate activated by items, reaches maximum signal at 60 items.

item.name: heavy weighted pressure plate
item.alt: iron weighted pressure plate, iron pressure plate, heavy pressure plate
item.other: Pressure plate activated by items, reaches maximum signal at 600 items.

item.name: redstone comparator
item.other: Has an input on the back (A) and another on the side (B). If signal B is stronger than A, there is no output, else it repeats A. Also has a subtraction mode.

item.name: daylight sensor
item.other: Emits Redstone signal based on strength of sunlight and time of day.

item.name: block of redstone
item.other: A piston-movable Redstone power source. Cannot be turned off.

item.name: nether quartz ore
item.other: Drops a Nether Quartz crystal.

item.name: hopper
item.other: Moves items into and out of containers, but does not forward or take in items when powered.

item.name: block of quartz
item.other: Decorative block, with a milky limestone/marble appearance.

item.name: quartz stairs
item.other: Allows player/mobs to move up blocks without jumping, can be placed upside-down.

item.name: activator rail
item.other: Activates Minecarts.

item.name: dropper
item.other: Interacts with Redstone, will drop things from front, will store items in any Chest when powered.

item.name: stained clay
item.other: A decorative, colored stone block.

item.name: hay bale
item.alt: hay block, bale, bale of hay
item.other: A flammable decorative block that can be fed to horses.

item.name: carpet
item.other: A thin decorative block the same thickness as pressure plates.

item.name: hardened clay
item.other: A decorative stone block.

item.name: block of coal
item.other: A decorative block that can be used as fuel.

item.name: iron shovel
item.other: N/A

item.name: iron pickaxe
item.other: N/A

item.name: iron axe
item.other: N/A

item.name: flint and steel
item.other: Used to start fires (can create a nether portal).

item.name: apple
item.other: Oak leaves have a 0.5% chance of dropping an apple.

item.name: bow
item.other: Longer charge is more powerful/ shoots farther.

item.name: arrow
item.other: Shot by bow.

item.name: coal
item.other: Can be used as fuel (80 seconds).

item.name: diamond
item.other: Can be obtained by breaking Diamond Ore, which is commonly between layers 4-13, ideally 12.

item.name: iron ingot
item.other: N/A

item.name: gold ingot
item.other: N/A

item.name: iron sword
item.other: N/A

item.name: wooden sword
item.other: Can be used as fuel (10 seconds).

item.name: wooden shovel
item.other: Can be used as fuel (10 seconds).

item.name: wooden pickaxe
item.alt: wooden pick, wood pickaxe, wood pick, wooden pickax, wood pickaxe
item.other: Can be used as fuel (10 seconds).

item.name: wooden axe
item.alt: wood axe, wooden ax, wood ax
item.other: Can be used as fuel (10 seconds).

item.other: N/A

item.other: N/A

item.other: N/A

item.other: N/A

item.name: stick
item.other: Can be used as fuel (5 seconds).

item.name: bowl
item.other: Used for mushroom soup.

item.name: mushroom stew
item.other: Returns empty bowl when eaten, can be collected from mooshroom if it is right-clicked with a bowl.

item.name: golden sword
item.other: N/A

item.name: golden shovel
item.other: N/A

item.name: golden pickaxe
item.alt: golden pick, gold pickaxe, gold pick, golden pickax, gold pickaxe

item.other: N/A

item.name: feather
item.other: N/A

item.name: gunpowder
item.other: N/A

item.name: wooden hoe
item.other: Can be used as fuel (10 seconds).

item.name: stone hoe
item.other: N/A

item.name: iron hoe
item.other: N/A

item.name: diamond hoe
item.other: N/A

item.name: golden hoe
item.other: N/A

item.name: wheat seeds
item.other: Only placeable on farmland, grows into wheat, grows faster if land is fertile.

item.name: wheat
item.other: N/A

item.name: bread
item.other: N/A

item.name: leather cap
item.other: Can be dyed by crafting the cap with dyes.

item.name: leather tunic
item.other: Can be dyed by crafting the tunic with dyes.

item.name: leather pants
item.other: Can be dyed by crafting the pants with dyes.

item.name: leather boots
item.other: Can be dyed by crafting the boots with dyes.

item.alt: chain mail hat, chain hat, chain helmet

item.other: N/A

item.name: flint
item.other: N/A

item.name: raw porkchop
item.other: N/A

item.name: cooked porkchop
item.other: N/A

item.name: painting
item.other: Paintings can be used to hide secret rooms.

item.name: golden apple
item.other: Gives Regeneration II (0:05) and Absorption (2:00).

item.name: enchanted golden apple
item.alt: magic golden apple, enchanted apple, magic apple, enchanted gold apple
item.other: Gives Regeneration V (0:30), Absorption (2:00), Resistance (5:00), and Fire Resistance (5:00).

item.name: sign
item.other: Useful for labeling, naming things, and leaving messages.

item.name: wooden door
item.other: Can be dug by Zombies.

item.name: bucket
item.other: Can pick up water/lava/milk.

item.name: water bucket
item.other: Allows players to place water sources.

item.name: lava bucket
item.other: Can be used as fuel (1,000 seconds).

item.name: minecart
item.other: Allows players to travel quickly over Rails, drops 1 Minecart when broken.

item.name: saddle
item.other: Saddles allow players to ride Pigs.

item.name: iron door
item.other: A door openable only by redstone, it cannot be broken by Zombies.

item.name: redstone dust
item.other: Redstone dust is placeable, conducts electrical-like power, and is an ingredient in crafting and brewing.

item.name: snowball
item.other: Snowballs are throwable, but do no damage to mobs, except Blaze (1.5 hearts) and Ender dragons (0.5 hearts).

item.name: boat
item.other: Boats allow fast and easy movement across any large area of Water.

item.name: leather
item.other: Dropped by cows, Leather can be crafted into armor, and is an ingredient in crafting Books and Item Frames.

item.name: milk
item.other: Milk does not restore health or hunger points, but does cancel all potion effects.

item.name: clay brick
item.other: Bricks can be crafted into Brick blocks and Flower Pots.

item.name: clay balls
item.other: Clay can be crafted to form Clay blocks, or baked in a Furnace to create Bricks.

item.name: sugar cane
item.other: The sole ingredient in Sugar and Paper.

item.name: paper
item.other: Made of Sugar Cane, Paper can be used to make and expand Maps, as well as make Books.

item.name: book
item.other: Crafted from Paper and Leather, Books are used to create Bookshelves, Enchantment Tables, and Books and Quills.

item.name: slimeball
item.other: Dropped by Slimes, Slimeballs are used to make Sticky Pistons and Magma Cream.

item.name: minecart with chest
item.other: A portable Chest, movable by Powered Rails, Minecarts with Furnaces, and players pushing the minecart.

item.name: minecart with furnace
item.other: Powered by coal, Minecarts with furnaces can travel 600 meters per piece of coal, and can push other minecarts.

item.name: egg
item.other: Laid by Chickens every 5-10 minutes, Eggs have a 1/8 chance of spawning 1 baby Chicken, and a 1/32 chance of spawning 4 baby Chickens.

item.name: compass
item.other: Compasses always point to the players original spawn point.

item.name: fishing rod
item.other: Can be used to catch Fish, or crafted with a Carrot to make a Carrot on a Stick.

item.name: clock
item.other: Tells you the time of day, place a clock in an Item Frame for wall Clock.

item.name: glowstone dust
item.other: N/A

item.name: raw fish
item.other: Caught by fishing.

item.name: cooked fish
item.other: N/A

item.name: ink sac
item.other: A black dye.

item.name: rose red
item.other: A vivid red dye.

item.name: cactus green
item.other: A darker green dye.

item.name: cocoa beans
item.other: A warm brown dye, also can be placed on Jungle Logs to create a Cocoa Pod.

item.name: lapis lazuli
item.other: A dark blue dye.

item.name: purple dye
item.other: A regal purple dye.

item.name: cyan dye
item.other: A muted blue-green dye.

item.name: light gray dye
item.key: B=bone meal | G=gray dye | I=ink sac
item.other: A light gray dye.

item.name: gray dye
item.other: A dark gray dye.

item.name: pink dye
item.other: A light pink dye.

item.name: lime dye
item.other: A bright green dye.

item.name: dandelion yellow
item.other: A bright yellow dye.

item.name: light blue dye
item.other: A sky blue dye.

item.name: magenta dye
item.key: B=bone meal | L=lapis lazuli | P=pink dye | R=rose red | U=purple dye
item.other: A purplish pink dye.

item.name: orange dye
item.other: A vivid orange dye.

item.name: bone meal
item.other: A bright white dye, Takes a random number (usually 2-3) of uses to fully grow plants.

item.name: bone
item.other: Skeletons and Wither Skeletons drop 0-2 bones on death.

item.name: sugar
item.other: Sugar, derived from Sugar Cane, is an important ingredient in Cake, Pumpkin Pie, and Fermented Spider Eyes.

item.name: cake
item.other: Cake is a placable food item, usable six times, that restores 2 hunger points per use.

item.name: bed
item.other: Sets the time to day, and sets your spawn point when used at night.

item.name: redstone repeater
item.other: Extends redstone signals, and can prevent powering in reverse.

item.name: cookie
item.other: N/A

item.name: map
item.other: N/A

item.name: shears
item.other: Shears wool from sheep, shears red mushrooms from mooshrooms, harvests placeable leaf blocks, grass, ferns, dead bushes, vines, and spider webs.

item.name: melon slice
item.other: N/A

item.name: pumpkin seeds
item.other: Only placeable on farmland, grows a central stem which grows fully before spawning a pumpkin next to it, grows faster if land is fertile.

item.name: melon seeds
item.other: Only placeable on farmland, grows a central stem which grows fully before spawning a melon next to it, grows faster if land is fertile.

item.name: raw beef
item.other: N/A

item.name: steak
item.other: N/A

item.name: raw chicken
item.other: Has a 30% chance of causing food poisoning.

item.name: cooked chicken
item.other: N/A

item.name: rotten flesh
item.alt: zombie flesh, zombie meat, rotten meat
item.other: Has an 80% chance of causing food poisoning.

item.name: ender pearl
item.other: When thrown, the user will teleport to its impact location, dealing 2.5 hearts of damage.

item.name: blaze rod
item.other: Can be used as fuel (120 seconds).

item.name: ghast tear
item.other: Dropped by Ghasts, used for brewing potions.

item.name: gold nugget
item.other: Dropped by zombie pigmen, used in glistering melons and golden apples.

item.name: nether wart seeds
item.alt: netherwart seeds, netherwort seeds, nether wort seeds, nether stalk seeds
item.other: Grows when planted on soul sand.

item.name: glass bottle
item.other: N/A

item.name: spider eye
item.other: Poisons player for 2 hearts of damage.

item.name: fermented spider eye
item.other: N/A

item.name: blaze powder
item.other: N/A

item.name: magma cream
item.other: N/A

item.name: brewing stand
item.other: N/A

item.name: cauldron
item.other: Can catch rain, can clean dyed leather armor when full.

item.name: eye of ender
item.other: N/A

item.name: glistering melon
item.other: Used to imbue potions with health restoring effects.

item.name: spawn egg
item.other: Used to spawn mobs, can be fired from dispenser.

item.name: bottle o' enchanting
item.alt: bottle o enchanting, bottle of enchanting, bottle o' enchantment,
item.other: Drops experience orbs when thrown.

item.name: fire charge
item.other: Can be used in same way as flint and steel, but with only one use.

item.name: book and quill
item.other: Can be written in by players.

item.name: written book
item.other: A signed book, can be read, but not edited.

item.name: emerald
item.other: Can be traded with villagers in exchange for items or enchantments.

item.name: item frame
item.other: Can hold any item or block for display, drops itself and block/item held when broken.

item.name: flower pot
item.other: Can display saplings, mushrooms, flowers, cacti, ferns, and dead bushes, effectively 0.375 meters tall to mobs.

item.name: carrot
item.other: Can be planted, can be crafted into golden carrot or carrot on a stick.

item.name: potato
item.other: Can be planted, can be cooked in a furnace.

item.name: baked potato
item.other: N/A

item.name: poisonous potato
item.other: Ironically restores more hunger points than a normal potato, 2% chance of dropping from fully grown potato plant, chance of poisoning player.

item.name: empty map
item.other: All maps are created empty, and are activated at first right click on map.

item.name: golden carrot
item.other: Ingredient for brewing potion of night vision.

item.name: head
item.other: Wither skeleton heads are rare drops from wither skeletons, all other heads are creative only, can be worn by players like a helmet.

item.name: carrot on a stick
item.other: Allows player to direct saddled pigs while riding, all pigs will follow the player if held.

item.name: nether star
item.other: Wither item drop, crafting ingredient for beacon.

item.name: pumpkin pie
item.other: N/A

item.name: firework rocket
item.other: taking away the firework star removes the ending explosion. Adding more firestars will increase the explosion by adding its effect to it. Removing one or two of the gunpowders decreases the duration before explosion.

item.name: firework star
item.other: Used to make firework rockets, adding in certain objects changes effect. Adding a colored dye adds that color to the explosion. Objects and their effects incude DIAMOND: Trail, GLOWSTONE DUST: twinkle, FIRE CHARGE: large ball shape, GOLD NUGGET: star shape, FEATHER: burst, HEAD: creeper shape.

item.name: enchanted book
item.other: Enchants silk touch to shears (for cobweb obtainability), enchants unbreaking to swords, bows, armor, hoe, fishing rods, and flint and steel.

item.name: redstone comparator
item.other: Item form of the Redstone Comparator.

item.name: nether brick
item.other: Nether Bricks can be crafted into Nether Brick blocks.

item.name: nether quartz
item.other: Nether Quartz is an important ingredient in Redstone Comparators, Daylight Sensors, and Blocks of Quartz.

item.name: minecart with tnt
item.other: A movable TNT block, can be activated by an Activator Rail, falling, reaching a dead end, or hitting another entity while moving.

item.name: minecart with hopper
item.other: A movable Hopper, it will pick up items on Rails and from containers above them.

item.name: iron horse armor
item.other: Basic armor for protecting horses.

item.name: gold horse armor
item.other: Midgrade armor for protecting horses.

item.name: diamond horse armor
item.other: Best armor for protecting horses.

item.name: lead
item.other: Used to restrain passive mobs.

item.name: name tag
item.other: Used to restrain passive mobs.

item.name: minecart with spawner
item.other: A movable spawner, it may spawn mobs when activated by an Activator Rail, powered by a Powered Rail, or spawn mobs constantly.

item.name: 13 disc
item.other: An ambient track of cave noises, metal clinks, splashes, wind blowing, and muffled bow firings.

item.name: cat disc
item.other: An upbeat, synthetic melody.

item.name: blocks disc
item.other: An upbeat, retro melody.

item.name: chirp disc
item.other: An upbeat, catchy tune.

item.name: far disc
item.other: A calm, relaxing, nature-like melody.

item.name: mall disc
item.other: A calm piece of serene music.

item.name: mellohi disc
item.other: A slow, steampunky guitar piece.

item.name: stal disc
item.other: A moderate jazz-like piece.

item.name: strad disc
item.other: A tropical-sounding synth piece.

item.name: ward disc
item.other: Begins with an excerpt from Chopin's Funeral March, but goes into an upbeat electronic adventure tune.

item.name: 11 disc
item.other: A spooky broken disc. Be very afraid!.

item.name: wait disc
item.alt: wait disk, where are we now disc, where are we now disk
item.other: A relaxing, upbeat tune with a blocky feel. First known as "Where are we now," but changed to "Wait" and added in 1.4.3.

assembly.item:
mob: 50 creeper mob: creeper, creep
Mob not craftable f N/A N/A Sword or Bow 20 health points Creative- Spawn Egg N/A N/A No Explode if close enough to player, drop gunpowder, can drop Music Disks if killed by skeleton.

item.name: skeleton
item.other: Shoot arrows at player from up to 15 blocks away, shoot faster when their target is closer. Drop arrows, bones, occasionally bows.

item.name: spider
item.other: Jump at player, can catch up to player at walking speed, drop string/ spider eyes.

item.name: giant
item.other: Unused, enormous mob.

item.name: mob: zombie
item.other: Follow player and attack by colliding with player. They alert other zombies when they see a player, and get more powerful as they lose health.

item.name: mob: slime
item.location: Swamps (depends on moon phase), certain chunks
item.other: Jump at player to attack, split into smaller versions on death, drop slimeballs.

item.name: mob: ghast
item.other: Fly, shoot exploding fireballs at player, drop gunpowder/ ghast tears.

item.name: zombie pigman
item.other: Run at player, if one is attacked a group will attack back, drop rotten flesh, gold nuggets/ occasionally golden tools.

item.name: enderman
item.other: Can teleport, get injured by water, can pick up certain blocks (dirt, grass, stone, sand), drop ender pearls.

item.name: cave spider
item.other: Jump at player, attacks deal poison damage to player, drop string/ spider eyes.

item.name: silverfish
item.other: Push player, can call other silverfish out of nearby blocks, do not drop anything.

item.name: blaze
item.other: Fly, shoot 3 fireballs in rapid succession, contact also hurts, drop blaze rods.

item.name: magma cube
item.other: Jump high, contact damages player, drop magma cream.

item.name: ender dragon
item.other: Flies, can destroy all blocks except end stone/ bedrock/ obsidian (passes through these), drops lots of experience, required to kill to win game, spawns ender portal and dragon egg on death (leads to credits upon entering ender portal).

item.name: wither
item.other: Fly, must be assembled, drop Nether stars.

item.name: bat
item.other: Fly, spawn in any large enclosed area at light level 10 or less, drop nothing.

item.name: witch
item.other: Spawn in swamps, attack with potions, heal themselves with potions.

item.name: pig
item.other: Drop raw porkchops, ridable.

item.name: sheep
item.other: Drop wool on death, shearable.

item.name: cow
item.other: Drop leather/ raw beef.

item.name: chicken
item.other: Drop feather/ raw chicken.

item.name: squid
item.other: Drop 1-3 Ink Sacs on death.

item.name: wolf
item.other: Drop nothing, can be tamed into dog with bones.

item.name: mooshroom
item.other: Drop red mushroom (if sheared)/ leather/ raw beef.

item.name: snow golem
item.other: Drop snowballs/ attack other mobs automatically, leave trails of snow in their path.

item.name: ocelot
item.other: Drop nothing, can be tamed into cat with fish.

item.name: iron golem
item.key: P=pumpkin/jack o lantern | I=block of iron
item.other: Drop iron/ roses, will attack anything attacking nearby villagers.

item.name: horse
item.other: Drop leather, and saddles, horse armor or chests if equipped. See horse menu for more information.

item.name: farmer
item.other: Brown Robe, can trade with player.

item.name: librarian
item.other: White Robe, can trade with player.

item.name: priest
item.other: Purple Robe, can trade with player.

item.name: blacksmith
item.other: Black Apron, can trade with player.

item.name: butcher
item.other: White Apron, can trade with player.

item.name: generic villager
item.other: Green Robe, can trade with player, does not spawn naturally or with spawn eggs.

item.name: ender crystal
item.other: Heal Ender Dragon, explode on destruction.

potion.name: water bottle
potion.obtainability: Survival, fill glass bottle with water

potion.name: potion of swiftness
potion.other: Increases player speed, jump length, and field of view.

potion.name: potion of fire resistance
potion.other: Makes player immune to fire, lava, and blaze attack damage.

potion.name: potion of poison
potion.other: Causes up to 36 damage over time, but will not reducce health below 1.

potion.name: potion of night vision
potion.other: Visually brightens everything to a light level of 15.

potion.name: potion of weakness
potion.other: Reduces melee damage by two health points.

potion.name: potion of strength
potion.other: Increases melee damage by three health points.

potion.name: potion of slowness
potion.other: Reduces player speed, jump length, and field of view.

potion.name: potion of invisibility
potion.other: Causes player (but not armor or tools) to become invisible, mobs do not attack unless touched.

biome.name: Desert
biome.about: A barren biome of sand and cacti. Many steep dunes can be found here, providing the only visual obstruction. Rain never falls here. Desert villages, desert wells and desert temples are found only here. Occasional pools of water can be found with sugar cane around them.
biome.items: Cacti, Sugar Cane, Dead Bushes, Sand, and Sandstone.
biome.mobs: Creepers, Skeletons, Zombies, and fairly frequent Endermen.

biome.name: Extreme Hills
biome.about: A mountainous biome with occasional oak trees. Many terrain structures are seen here, and underground cave systems are more abundant here than anywhere else. Geographical features such as waterfalls, floating islands, high cliffs, and overhangs allow for good views, but poor fighting ground, due to the high risk of falling. This is where Emerald ore spawns, and is the only biome where Silverfish are native.
biome.items: Oak trees, Grass, Flowers, Emerald Ore, and Silverfish Blocks.
biome.mobs: Creepers, Skeletons, Zombies, Endermen, and Silverfish.

biome.name: Forest
biome.about: This is a great starting biome due to the large number of birch and oak trees. It is dangerous at night, however, due to difficulties in navigation around trees and hills, ease of mob spawning, and obscured vision.
biome.items: Oak and Birch trees, Grass, Flowers, and Mushrooms.
biome.mobs: Creepers, Skeletons, Zombies, occasional Endermen, and Wolves.

biome.name: Jungle
biome.about: A dense and tropical biome, full of jungle trees, and with many small lakes. Leaves cover much of the forest floor. This is the only biome containing ferns and jungle trees. Ocelots, jungle temples, and cocoa plants spawn exclusively here. This is a very nice location to spawn in, but it is very difficult to navigate, due to the dense vegitation.
biome.items: Jungle and Oak trees, Grass, Ferns, Flowers, Vines, and Cocoa Pods.
biome.mobs: Creepers, Skeletons, Zombies, Endermen, and Ocelots.

biome.name: Mushroom Island
biome.about: A rare biome with mycelium instead of grass. It is always located next to an Ocean. This is the only place where Huge Mushrooms and Mooshrooms spawn naturally, and is the only place where mushrooms can grow in full sunlight. No other mobs besides mooshrooms spawn here, including any cave systems or other natural structures found underneath this biome as well, making spelunking and exploring very safe. You can plce dirt here and grow dirt and grass-based plants, but the mycellium will take over the dirt if it is adjacent to it, so farming takes more effort than normal.

biome.name: The Nether (Hell)
biome.about: The Nether is composed almost entirely of netherrack, and is enclosed by bedrock at layers 1 and 128, so there is no sky. Very large Lava oceans are frequent in this biome, and glowstone "chandeliers" can be found overhead. Nether fortresses can also generate here, and pre-lit fires are very commonly found. Navigation is somewhat difficult, due to the intricate cave systems and sudden rises and drops found here.
biome.items: Netherrack, Nether Brick, Soul Sand, and Glowstone
biome.mobs: Ghasts, Blazes, Wither Skeletons, Magma cubes, and Zombie Pigmen.

biome.name: Ocean
biome.about: A large biome filled with water and occasionally very small islands with minor vegetation. No friendly mobs can be found here, but hostile mobs can be found swimming around. Large caves are very common below sea level, and underwater ravines and mine shafts may be found.
biome.mobs: Creepers, Skeletons, Zombies, and rarely Endermen.

biome.name: Plains
biome.about: A somewhat flat biome with lots of grass and rolling hills. It contains relatively few trees, allowing for great visibility. Villages and water holes are common, and many passive mobs spawn here. This is a great place to build a house on, due to the level ground, but not a very good place to start, due to the lack of trees.

biome.name: The End (Sky)
biome.about: The End is composed almost entirely of a floating island of End Stone, dotted by obsidian towers with Ender Crystals on top. Digging downwards can be dangerous, as there is no flat bottom made of bedrock.
biome.items: End Stone, Obsidian, Bedrock, and Ender Crystals.

biome.name: Swampland
biome.about: A biome filled with flat, dry areas and shallow pools of water with lily pads. Swamp huts can be found exclusively here. Oak trees with vines hanging off them can be found here, and are often found growing out of the water If the trees are on land, mushrooms (more frequently the brown variety) can be found in abundance beneath them. Moving quickly through this biome is a challenge due to the random pools of water, but is a nice place to spawn into.
biome.items: Oak trees, Grass, Vines, Lily pads, Mushrooms, and Clay.
biome.mobs: Creepers, Skeletons, Zombies, Endermen, Slimes, and Witches.

biome.name: Taiga
biome.about: A hilly biome with many spruce trees. Snow falls here instead of rain, forming ice and snow on the ground. Hills are common, making navigation a bit more difficult than in other biomes, and wolves spawn here more than in other biomes.
biome.items: Spruce trees, Grass, Flowers, Snow, Snowfall, and Ice.
biome.mobs: Creepers, Skeletons, Zombies, Endermen, and Wolves.

biome.name: Ice Plains (Tundra)
biome.about: A flatter biome almost completely covered with snow. It snows instead of raining here, and lakes and rivers are also frozen over. Hills are much more steep than normal, and there are few natural oak trees. This is a more difficult starting biome, due to the lack of wood, the scarcity of flowing water, and the difficulty to farm efficiently.
biome.items: Oak trees, Snow, Snowfall, and Ice.

command.name: /clear
command.description: Clears the user's inventory

command.name: /debug
command.description: Starts and stops minecraft debug mode

command.name: /defaultgamemode[0/1/2]
command.description: Change world default gamemode to Survival(0), Creative(1), Adventure(2)

command.name: /difficulty[0/1/2/3/:difficulty:]
command.description: Change difficulty to "peaceful"(0), "easy"(1), "normal"(2), "hard"(3)

command.name: /enchant[:enchantmentid:][:level:}
command.description: Enchants item with specified enchantment at the specified level

command.name: /gamemode[0/1/2][:player:]
command.description: Change the gamemode for the specified player to survival(0), creative(1), adventure(2)

command.name: /gamerule[:rule:]
command.description: Specify game rules (i.e. "doFireTrick", "doMobLoot", "doTileDrops")

command.name: /give[:player:][object id][amount][data value]
command.description: Gives specified player an amount of the specified object. Data value is the value after the (:) in data values

command.name: /help[page number] (or) /?[page number]
command.description: Shows a list of commands in alphabetical order

command.name: /kill
command.description: Kills the player

command.name: /me[:action text:]
command.description: Posts a narrative message of the player doing something

command.name: /publish
command.description: Opens the current game to LAN

command.name: /say[:message:]
command.description: Posts a message in bright letters

command.name: /seed
command.description: Returns the seed of the current world

command.name: /spawnpoint[:player:][x][y][z]
command.description: Sets the spawnpoint of the specified player to the coordinates or to the current location if no coordinates

command.name: /time[set/add][amount]
command.description: Sets or adds an amount of time. 0=dawn, 6000=midday, 12000=dusk, 18000=midnight

command.name: /toggledownfall
command.description: Starts and stops rain and snow

command.name: /tp[:player:][:destination player:] (or) /tp[:player:][x][y][z]
command.description: Teleports specified player to destination player, or to coordinates

command.name: /weather[clear/rain/thunder][duration]
command.description: Sets the weather, duration not required

command.name: /xp[amount][:player:]
command.description: Gives specified amount of experience points to specified player

command.name: /testfor
command.description: Tests for players, use comparators to get an analog redstone signal indicating the number of players found

command.name: /scoreboard[objectives/players]
command.description: Used for scoring players based on objectives, health, or based on events such as death; it also has a team mode with friendly fire options

gamemode.name: Survival
gamemode.description: Survival is the traditional Minecraft experience, with health and hunger. Blocks can be placed and broken (not instantly), but are not unlimited in quantity.

gamemode.name: Creative
gamemode.description: Creative is a build-focused experience, without health or hunger. Players can fly and are not impeded by many obstacles. Blocks can be placed and broken instantly, and are unlimited.

gamemode.name: Hardcore
gamemode.description: Hardcore is like survival on steroids, locked in the hardest difficulty. Similar to a Roguelike, if you die, you must start completely from scratch in a new world.

gamemode.name: Adventure
gamemode.description: Adventure mode restricts players from breaking or placing blocks. They can still interact with togglable blocks and deal damage to mobs. Its primary use is custom adventure maps.

item.name: FIXME
item.other: N/A
